title: recompile external packages after all.bash
body:
by **raul.san@sent.com**: 
When is re-compiled Go, then all packages installed externally are lost (removed).

A solution for goinstall could be that packages were downloaded to a directory in
$GOROOT like 'ext' (external), for that they could be re-compiled automatically when Go
is re-compiled. 

So, all.bash could remade goinstalled packages along with everything else.
